title: Historical Volatility of C3is Inc Stock and its Impact on Investor Behavior

content.text: Historical volatility refers to the measure of past price changes of a stock or security. It provides insights into the level of uncertainty or risk associated with the stock's price movement. In the case of C3is Inc stock, we will analyze its historical volatility and its impact on investor behavior.

content.section: Historical Volatility of C3is Inc Stock
content.text: To analyze the historical volatility of C3is Inc stock, we calculate the standard deviation of its past stock returns. This measure depicts the dispersion of the stock's returns from its average return. Using the stock's price data over a specific time period, we can estimate its historical volatility.

High historical volatility can significantly impact investor behavior. Investors may become more cautious, especially those who are risk-averse. They might be reluctant to invest in a stock with a history of high volatility as it indicates potential large price swings. On the other hand, some investors may be attracted to high volatility stocks, seeking potential for larger gains.

The historical volatility of C3is Inc stock can provide insights into risk management for investors. By analyzing the stock's price movements over time, investors can assess the potential risks associated with holding the stock. This information can help investors make informed decisions and implement risk management strategies such as diversification, using stop-loss orders, or adjusting investment allocations.

Analyzing the historical volatility of C3is Inc stock can provide valuable information to investors regarding its past price movements and associated risks. Understanding historical volatility allows investors to make informed decisions about risk management and adapt their investment strategies accordingly.

news.headline: C3is Announces Agreement to Acquire Handysize Bulk Carrier from an Affiliated Company
news.summary: ATHENS, Greece, April 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- C3is Inc. (Nasdaq: CISS) (the “Company”) announced today that it has entered into an agreement to acquire the Bulk Carrier Eco Spitfire for $16.19 million from Brave Maritime, an affiliated company. Eco Spitfire, a Marshall Islands registered vessel, was built at a Japanese ship yard in 2012, and has a cargo carrying capacity of approximately 33,664 dwt.
